It's a great extension and I know it stopped working with the latest chrome updates, but here's a temporary fix (macos only): close your browser and run the following command in terminal: 

Brave: open -a "Brave Browser.app" --args --disable-blink-features=PrettyPrintJSONDocument
Chrome: open -a "Google Chrome.app" --args --disable-blink-features=PrettyPrintJSONDocument

Credits: https://github.com/tulios/json-viewer/issues/342#issuecomment-1727515249
